features: If you have black skin, Dreamlover black wig caps for women can blend well with your dark skin and perfectly create a bald cap method for lace front wigs, providing you with a natural look.
These wig caps to hold wig in place are made of stretchy nylon material to fit different head circumference, more comfortable to wear and headache-free for a long time.
Our bald cap for wigs is designed as soft and thin material that keeps the scalp breathable without getting stuffy and itchy when worn.

Whether you have short or long hair, our stocking wig cap for wig making will fit the bill. If you have long and thick hair, please braid your hair and pin them around your head as flat as possible before using our wig cap.

12 pieces high-quality hair net for wigs are not easily damaged to ensure long term use. They can help you create different looks for different occasions, such Halloween, Christmas, fancy dress party, etc.
description: Product Description Outstanding Workmanship Prevent Slippage Deamlover stocking wig cap with thicker and wider elastic band has increase the force area and the resistance between the wig cap and your forehead, which helps hold your wigs in place without slipping easily. Great Elasticity Very stretchy nylon material of our wig cap is elastic enough to fit different head sizes and hair lengths. If it's too tight for you, stretch the elastic band or place it on a wig head for a few days to make it looser, which is more comfortabale for you. Dreamlover Black Wig Caps for Women Color: Our black wig caps are suitable for women and men who have black and dark skin tone. It can match the dark skin tone perfectly and would not be noticed easily. High Quality: Dreamlover wig caps are made of great elastic nylon material with superb craftsmanship, which would not break off easily and ensure a long term use. Breathability: Our thin and soft fabric of wig hair cap is breathable and comfortable for your scalp without any allergies, head itching or peculiar smell. Wearing Method Sleek or braid your hair and pin them as flat as possible before you wear the wig cap. After wearing, you can also use a few bobby pins to fasten the wig cap with your hair for more security. Advanced Wearing Method---Bald Cap for Lace Front Wigs Using Instruction Step 1 : Wearing the black wig cap to the desired position, and use a heavy hair spray or wig glue to stick down the wig cap. Step 2 : After the glue is completely dry, use scissor to cut the stocking wig cap from the middle to the suitable position. (Please use scissors carefully to avoid scratches) Step 3 : Cut away the excess wig hair cap along the line and trim the edges as smooth as possible. Step 4 : Using foundation or power makeup to cover the edges for a more seamless look to achieve bald head effect. (According to individual situation)
